channel.title: Empathy-06 Developement
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://www.empathy-06.net46.net][img]http://i.imgur.com/zqedi.png[/img][/url][/CENTER]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/O93VJ.png[/img] [url=http://www.empathy-06.net46.net][b][font=trebuchet ms][color=brown]Forums[/b][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zSKvG.png[/img] [url=https://twitter.com/Empathy2006][b][color=blue][font=trebuchet ms]Twitter[/font][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mCgio.png[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/officialempathy06][font=trebuchet ms][b]YouTube[/b][/font][/url]
[b][u]Developers:[/u][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vEcNB.png[/img][b]Mod Eminem[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vEcNB.png[/img][b]Mod Kaxxon[/b]
[u][b]Programmers & Administrators[/b][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yo3vV.gif[/img] & [img]http://i.imgur.com/gXozk.png[/img] [b]Mod Lewis[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yo3vV.gif[/img] & [img]http://i.imgur.com/gXozk.png[/img] [b]Mod Shenron[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yo3vV.gif[/img] & [img]http://i.imgur.com/gXozk.png[/img] [b]Mod Max[/b]
[u][b]Programmers[/b][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gXozk.png[/img] None.
[u][b]Administrators:[/b][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yo3vV.gif[/img] [b]WallyShotYou[/b]
[u][b]Moderators:[/b][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IUK3R.png[/img] [b]Orange[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IUK3R.png[/img] None. [img]http://i.imgur.com/IUK3R.png[/img] None.
[u][b]Forum Moderators:[/b][/u] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Jet8X.gif[/img] Alt [img]http://i.imgur.com/Jet8X.gif[/img] Tyrucca
[u][b]Progress[/b][/u]:
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
[u][b]Client Features[/b][/u]:
- Fast client - Autocache downloader - 377 Maps - 377 Items - 377 Anims/Gfx - 377 Gameframe - 377 Npcs - No customs
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ivexz.png[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Combat[/SIZE][/B]
[B]PvP fully complete[/B] [B]PvM fully complete[/B] [B]Perfect max hit formulas[/B] [B]Perfect accuracy forumlas[/B] [B]Every weapon special attacks[/B] [B]Equipment effects[/B] (i.e barrows) [B]Equipment requirements[/B] [B]Degradable items[/B] [B]Weapon poisoning[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/l2dc1.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Agility[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Failing Obstacles Gnome Agility Course Agility Pyramid Brimhaven Agility Arena Monkey Agility Course Wilderness Agility Course Werewolf Agility Course Gaining Tickets Rewards[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OSahM.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Cooking[/SIZE][/B] [B]All Fish All Foods[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R7rzI.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Crafting[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Pottery Leather Dragonhide Leather Snakeskin Armor[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pNw2O.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Farming[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Obtaining Seeds Farming Tools Farming Plots Preparing Plots Growing Your Crops Protecting Your Plants Produce Containers Other Events & Items Herb Allotments Fruit/Vegetable Allotments Tree/Bush Allotments Compost Bin[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OLVUz.gif[/img][B][SIZE=3]Firemaking[/SIZE][/B]
[B]All Logs Fire removing/global Clipped Autowalk[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/45Dbv.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Fishing[/SIZE][/B]
[b]Catching Fish Fishing Guild Random Events[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0Ewwp.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Fletching[/SIZE][/B]
[B][color=orange]Fletching Arrows[/B] [B][color=orange]Fletching Bows[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LGxt0.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Herblore[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Obtaining Herbs Obtaining Vials Creating Potions Combining & Emptying Potions Greenman's Ale Cleaning Herbs All Ingredients All Potions[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/aziYy.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Mining[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Mining All Ores Obtaining Gems Pickaxe Requirements Rune Essence[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1Of2r.gif[/img][B][SIZE=3]Prayer[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Bone burying Protect Prayers/Deflect Prayers + effects Prayers Prayer Books Clothing [/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YKGxe.gif[/img] [B]Runecrafting[/B]
[B]Rune Essence Pure Rune Essence Talismans Tiaras Runecrafting Altars Abyss Crafting Runes[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9nBwJ.gif[/img] [B][SIZE=3]Slayer[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Low level Tasks Medium level Tasks High level Tasks NPCS Every Slayer Master Slayer Dungeons Slayer Tower Pollinivneach Slayer Dungeon [/B] [u][b]Bosses[/b][/u]:
-Agrith Na-Na -Agrith Naar -Big Wolf -Bouncer -Chaos Elemental -Chronozon -Count Draynor -Culinaromancer -Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Damis -Delrith -Dessous -Dessourt -Elvarg -Fareed -Flambeed -General Khazard -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -Kamil -King Black Dragon -Koschei The Deathless -Nezikchened -Salarin the Twisted -Sea Troll Queen -Slash Bash -Shaikahan -Tanglefoot -Tolna -Treus Dayth -TzTok-Jad
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control -Fishing Trawler -Gnome Ball -Bar crawl -Blast Furnace -Champion's Challenge -Chompy hunting -Games room -Jungle Clean Up -Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne) -Rogue Trader -Rogue's Den -Splitbark Armour -Temple Trekking -Magic Training Arena
[SIZE=3][B]Smithing[/B][/SIZE]
[B]Smelting Ores Smithing Steel Smithing Mithril Smithing Adamant Smithing Rune[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/U5iTd.gif[/img][B][SIZE=3]Thieving[/SIZE][/B]
[ul][B]Picking Pockets (All npcs & Correct Items) Looting Market Stalls[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZPmo7.gif[/img][B]Woodcutting[/B]
[B]All Trees All Axes Inferno Adze Machetes Canoes[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jxry4.gif[/img] [b]Tutorial Island[/b] -Dialogues -NPCs -Doors (Need to make them open. They teleport you as of now) -Skills (Got to fix some bugs with them)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/S1QRl.png[/img] [b]Random Events[/b]
[b]Genie Drunken dwarf Ent tree Explosive mining rocks Flying pickaxe heads Flying axe heads Whirlpool fishing Big fish stealing equipment Evil chicken Freaky Forester River troll Rock golem Shade Spirit tree Zombie[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b] Music tab All skilling sounds Various attacking sounds Music on region of player
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BvFw7.png[/img] [B]Quests[/B]
[b][size=18pt]F2P[/size][/b] [B]Cook's Assistant Doric's Quest Imp Catcher Pirate's Treasure Restless Ghost Romeo & Juliet Rune Mysteries Sheep shearer Vampire Slayer Witch's Potion [b][size=18pt]P2P[/size][/b] Gertrude's Cat [/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hMwCU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u6QWT.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZLyMK.png[/img][/ul]

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“tyrucca, post:14, topic:468163”]Andrew, why are you hating bud? I’m not going to be programming at all. I’m just trying to see the potential that this community has.[/quote]I was in a bad mood yesterday, but anyways clean your inbox please if you haven’t already.

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @Wizard_jesse Wizard jesse
item.description:
@Wizard_jesse wrote:

- Autocache downloader

Why not just use a jaggrab?

Also if you want a true remake why not just use close to a 317 cache or convert your protocol to a 377?

Read full topic

maturity, comprehension capability for advanced items, and etc

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

mr extremez:

Good luck. But no offence why did you accept tyrucca he has no java experience at all and just asked to be spoonfed. He bought my old source for 15m and I bet you guys are using that also lol :P.

[font=comic sans ms]We accepted him as a Forum moderator.

Also, we didn’t care at the time (mostly) for who applied. We needed anyone.

We still need another person for programming. Although, this time we’re picky.

But, someone for sure we declined is…

Mod Eminem
Head Developer[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

Thanks though.
[/quote]

You’re welcome. This also belongs in the Development Teams section. Here’s a better format in-case you decide your original one isn’t up to par.[/quote]

Thank you, @Team_Rocket. The staff at Empathy-06 are thankful for your help. =)

@tyrucca

Thanks for applying! But, be sure to apply here Empathy-06

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @tyrucca tyrucca
item.description:
@tyrucca wrote:

My Profession: Forum Moderator

Date of Birth: March 29th, 1999

Contact Details: My Skype is Brandon.Bryant100, and my MSN is Tyrucca@hotmail.com.
I’m usually on my Skype. You can ask for further more information there.

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RebirthScape:

Thanks though.

You’re welcome. This also belongs in the Development Teams section. Here’s a better format in-case you decide your original one isn’t up to par.

First and Last Name:

Date of Birth:

Time Zone:

Past experience in working with Private Servers:

Past experience with RuneScape Private Servers:

Which Languages other than Java do you know:

Examples of your work:

Can you Develop Server-sided content and features:

Can you Develop Client-sided content as well:

Other than Private Server Development, please list your capabilities:

How do you wish to be compensated:

How can we contact you:

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:468163”][quote author=RebirthScape link=topic=585123.msg4158654#msg4158654 date=1352858742]
I will need a group of people (4-15)
[/quote]

This is going to be a disaster with 15 Developers.

P.S. Your Application won’t attract advanced programmers. You don’t ask for nearly enough information.[/quote]

Well, it’s around that. Not too much, plus we need all the help we can get.

[font=comic sans ms]There isn’t much information to provide…Just the ones that are input. Thanks though.

Mod Eminem
Head Developer[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Empathy-06 Developement
